channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1516555244708237318
#es @ 1516552735461715977
item.description:
#COVID19 🇵🇪 ¿Está incrementando la positividad? NO.
A la fecha del último reporte, vía #DatosAbiertos , todas las regiones por debajo del 5% en positividad y ninguna con punto de quiebre al alza.
Seguimos con TODOS los indicadores en su punto más bajo https://t.co/76njuPvjSI

item.title: #en @ 1516530105450782720
item.description: Interesting new dataset on the CoV open data portal. Inventory of storefronts, with two years of data. Lets you explore storefronts by business name, types of businesses for 2020 and 2021. https://t.co/BnvCxdxntC https://t.co/STcovWztwD

item.title: #pt @ 1516502017681895431
item.description:
📌 Dá tempo de organizar um evento presencial do Open Data Day 2022!
A @OKFN vai ajudar equipes interessadas a sediar um evento #ODD2022 em suas cidades.
Conheça as condições e formas de participar da seleção de mini-bolsas: https://t.co/MJW892J2oH
#OpenKnowledgeFoundation https://t.co/M1lm5hKgWd

item.title: #es @ 1516463867735457792
item.description: Una pequeña contribución a la sociedad guayaquileña frente a las inundaciones. #SolucionesBasadasEnLaNaturaleza #naturebasedsolutions @espol https://t.co/dobY6GDAGB

item.title: #es @ 1516458883367292937
item.description: #ManizalesEnClaveODS Toda la gestión de @CiudadManizales está disponible en tiempo real en nuestro @LabInnMzales. Los ciudadanos pueden consultar en esta plataforma los avances de cada proyecto. Los datos abiertos son fundamentales para la transparencia y participación ciudadana. https://t.co/YSmyQqx8qs

item.title: #es @ 1516456733362868226
item.description:
Contar con estadísticas y datos abiertos sobre las violencias hacia la población LGBTI+ es fundamental para diseñar mejores políticas de prevención y acceso a la justicia.
En Jalisco desde 2020 colaboramos con @visible_mx para registrar, visibilizar y atender este fenómeno. https://t.co/98p7dG9dtF

item.title: #en @ 1516447617672220680
item.description: I can see trip times for any segment of any line on any day in Boston for the past 7 years, which is a true testament to the #MBTA commitment to open data

item.title: #en @ 1516442964410744844
item.description:
Always more to do, but @MTA deserves credit for improving transparency.
Adding running times to the dashboard will put MTA in the vanguard of service planning & quality open data nationwide.
Thanks to @ReinventAlbany @RachaelFauss for leading the coalition that made this happen https://t.co/YJrZUjljzE https://t.co/9JKUpwqcq6

item.title: #en @ 1516434950962102274

item.title: #en @ 1516429706328956943
item.description:
Good to see @MTA release an #opendata plan and catalog, as part of compliance with the MTA Open Data law, sponsored by @LeroyComrie @Bobby4Brooklyn and signed by @GovKathyHochul.
We look forward to reviewing the plan and catalog, and providing feedback: https://t.co/NdYHefhs1b https://t.co/hAlahrW2Pi

item.title: #pt @ 1516428544213143553
item.description: ℹ️📊O @pt_INE disponibilizou os "Resultados Provisórios ao nível de subsecção estatística 2021" no formato geopkg, que podes encontrar aqui: https://t.co/pG2SzZFVeP Se preferes em geojson, nós fizemos a conversão para que não te falte nada: https://t.co/2iaZPgCZJd #opendata 📊ℹ️ https://t.co/Pxetd7qOeN

item.description:
3/ @flipsidecrypto drives ecosystem growth and retention for blockchains. 🚀

item.title: #es @ 1516401729578938369

item.title: #en @ 1516401226790973452
item.description:
Two years ago, we asked California for info on all their judges going back 70 years. Last year, we imported it into our DB. This year, we enriched it by hand.
Today we announce high quality open data about 1,400 CA judges: https://t.co/fJXUVF0JI3

item.title: #en @ 1516363478658916354
item.description:
For #data to be open, it needs to be in a format and structure that can be easily understood by anyone and everyone. And there shouldn’t be any limitations against using the data in any particular way.
#OpenData #dataprotection #tech https://t.co/UTRT3GkwIz
